name: custom-blocks/information-dropdown-switcher
title: Information Dropdown Switcher
description: A dropdown switcher block to display information with tooltips in a grid layout.

items.label: Addiction-Focused Healthcare
items.tooltip: We provide sub-acute programing for substance use disorder. This offers 24/7 medical supervision in a live-in environment at our facilities for patients in need of a higher level of medical care and mental health services that is fully focused on recovery in a sober environment.

items.label: Case Management & Discharge Planning
items.tooltip: Comprehensive case management and discharge planning services.

items.label: Co-Occurring Disorder Treatment
items.tooltip: Integrated treatment for co-occurring mental health and substance use disorders.

items.label: Inpatient Residential (IR & RTC)
items.tooltip: Inpatient residential treatment and residential treatment center services.

items.label: Diagnostic & COVID Testing
items.tooltip: Comprehensive diagnostic services including COVID-19 testing.
